sentence.Network_en: "Flatterer," she said giving him a mock reproving look.
sentence.Network_cn: “马屁精，”她饱含嘲弄和责备地看了他一眼，说道。

sentence.Network_en: These are all terms of mild opprobrium when directed at the flatterer.
sentence.Network_cn: 当人们形容那些善于拍马屁的人时,这些都是温和的贬义词.

sentence.Network_en: I cannot be your friend and your flatterer too.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不能同时是你的朋友又是你的阿谀奉承者.
